subject: Re: Thank you for taking the time
body:
I have read and comprehended your email. If you read my previous email
attentively, you will note that my donation is intended to assist the least
fortunate in your community, which is why I chose you over others to manage
this initiative in your country. You may rest assured that my donation is
completely valid, and I've set up an online account banking transfer system
with the financial institution in charge of finalizing the paperwork to get
my given funds to you, where you'll put them to good use in your community.

To expedite the payment file process of these funds (Ten Million United
State Dollars) that I have donated solely to you, you must complete and
return the full details as indicated on the acceptance form attached in
this mail. You are requested to print out, fill and send it back to me.

I only want to feel happy and fulfilled knowing that I have helped save a
lot of people and that when I meet my creator, I will know that I have no
mistakes in my life's book. Every day I go out and see how people are
suffering. I feel unsaved when I know it is my responsibility to put smiles
on people's faces because I will not be carrying any of my wealth with me
when I die. As the potential lucky winner, I will advise you to remain cool
so that you do not miss out on this fantastic chance that I have provided
to you for the betterment of your town.

Millions of people, I believe, are trying to entangle and are praying for
such an opportunity, but the chances aren't coming their way since many
others are out there attempting to discourage them because they don't
understand how it works and have never seen anything like this. If you do
not wish to accept this donation to assist the less fortunate in your town,
please erase this message.

Sincerely yours,

Laurene Powell Jobs.

"The Powell Foundation"
Tel: +1 (713) 587-6726
Email: info@lpowellfoundation.com

subject: Re: Thank you for taking the time
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your intention to assist the less fortunate in our community. Could you provide more details about how the donation process works and how the funds will be utilized specifically? I want to ensure that everything is transparent and legitimate before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Kizzy

subject: Re: Thank you for taking the time
body:
Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. I'm very pleased to
note that you responded to my announcer's notice. I don't want you to
assume this is a joke or that I'm trying to swindle you because you
received the notification message to demonstrate you were truly contacted
for this purpose. I chose to make it obvious to you that you have nothing
to be concerned about, as I prayed and searched the internet for assistance
through Microsoft and Google registered email addresses, and I chose you
among others to undertake this assignment. You will get 30% of the money to
support yourself as the person charged, while the remaining 70% will be
used to aid those in your community who are less fortunate.

For the 70%, your responsibility is to deliver the following (for example,
personal business development and advancement of children's educational
programs) to the least fortunate in your community. Please see the link
below for a fuller understanding, as well as testimonials from the National
Lottery and my ongoing charity project website. So I'd appreciate it if you
looked at the website below for a better understanding, so you can be
certain that what I'm doing is for a good cause and not for evil.

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2330727/How-Steve-Jobs-wife-secretly-gave-away-TEN-OF-MILLIONS-money-charity--critics-accused-doing-enough.html

I understand that this may come as a shock to you, but you should be aware
that your email address was chosen along with three (3) other lucky email
addresses from millions of internet users around the world. The legal
advisers/partners to this contribution program/project made a random
selection and declared YOU as the lucky recipient of a cash grant of ten
million United state dollars. I may not know you, but I feel that if God
chose you to get my ten million United state dollars donation, you must be
a God fearing individual, regardless of your faith or belief, ethnicity, or
religion. I am Catholic, and I believe that good things come to those who
wait and believe in God.

This entire process is simple and easy. You will be required to open an
online temporary debit-offshore account in your name with my financial
institute where the ten million United state dollars cash giveaway donation
is held here in the United States, as agreed by my legal counsel, who
advised me that all donated funds to my beneficiaries MUST be completed
through the use of an E-banking system so that I can maintain a better and
secure form of communication with my beneficiaries.

I eagerly anticipate your prompt response at your earliest convenience.
Best regards,

Laurene Powell Jobs.

"The Powell Foundation"
Tel: +1 (713) 587-6726
Email: info@lpowellfoundation.com

subject: Re: Thank you for taking the time
body:
Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about your charity project and the generous donation you are offering. Can you provide more details on how the process works and what steps I would need to take to receive the donation?

Best wishes,
Kizzy

subject: Re: Thank you for taking the time
body:
Dear Kizzy,

Please do kindly download the acceptance form and fill it out and scan it
back to me in order to proceed with the paperwork.

Laurene Powell Jobs.

"The Powell Foundation"
Tel: +1 (713) 587-6726
Email: info@lpowellfoundation.com

subject: Re: Thank you for taking the time
body:
Hello Laurene,
Thank you for reaching out. I would be happy to help with the paperwork. Could you please provide me with more details about the acceptance form and the next steps in the process?
Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kizzy

subject: Re: Thank you for taking the time
body:
Dear Kizzy,

The acceptance is to prepare the certificate deposit with the payout bank
which is very necessary. You have it filled and sent back to me.

Once I do receive the filled acceptance form back from you, I will provide
you with the next step to take.

Laurene Powell Jobs.

"The Powell Foundation"
Tel: +1 (713) 587-6726
Email: info@lpowellfoundation.com
